Sure, Cuervo, but look here. I've done it all, man. I killed Plissken, I got your girl back, I got it all. Just for you, Cuervo. Just for you. Dead silence. Cuervo Jones stands with his hand extended. Map To The Stars Eddie gives up, starts to hand Cuervo th prototype... ... but slips on the wet floor... ... and drops the prototype with a CLANK!
A red light comes on, blinks urgently.

(tiny, filtered) I am now armed and ready for use. Use extreme caution. The location of the effected blast area can only be determined by the orbital position of the SatStar Ring. Everyone in the tunnel is frozen, unable to move. Slowly Jones picks up the prototype, stares at it, then breaks i smile...
This is turning out to be my lucky day. (stares coldly at Map To The Stars Eddie) Get this asshole outta here. Several Mescalitos grab Map To The Stars Eddie, pull him along the tunnel.
Cuervo, wait. Please... Cuervo Jones turns to Utopia, who stands numbly staring o drop-off. He walks over to her, then slaps her hard, vici across the face. Utopia reacts to the stinging slap.
Cuervo...?
You're my woman, you understand? You don't let anybody take you away from me without a fight.
I tried...
(in her face) Nobody leaves Cuervo Jones. Not unless you give your life. You fight till you're dead. Then I forgive you. (screams) Understand? (shakes her) Understand?
Yes... He shoves her down the tunnel...
Let's go. The others follow them...
As Cuervo Jones and Utopia emerge from the manhole cover, sound of hundreds of helicopters rise.
(looks up) Look, baby. They're all mine.

Above Manchester and the Forum is filled with helicopters models, all makes, mostly the older, discarded military B Phoenix 14-bladed attack choppers that scream through the blackness like scythe-slashing robot bugs. They are on th southeast, toward Orange County.

head_text.subj: EXT. SKY VIEW OF L.A. BY NIGHT

text: Looking out at L.A. from above Mount Lee, see the Hollywo and wave after wave of helicopters thundering across the

head_text.subj: THE TWIN TOWERS OF CENTURY CITY

text: They're like buck teeth, sheered off and crumbling, stuck the sky. Chopper roar overhead. A group of vagrants clust a camp fire on the top floor of one of the towers. They'r watching a futuristic big-spin lotto on a large screen TV sound of the choppers brings them to the edge of the buil the walls of the floors beneath have been torn away. Desk furniture, rugs, everything hangs out over the empty spac
Pandemonium. Troops, vehicles, helicopters, everything is urgent motion. A loudspeaker voice blares:
Full stage battle alert. All personnel to battle stations.
Malloy, the President and Brazen charge down a hallway in Command HQ. The place is jumping. Full scramble alert.
A sky full of enemy choppers on radar. Moving over the city to the southeast. A COM Officer rushes up to Malloy...
Commander - massive vehicle and troop movement on the ground. All major streets leading to the southeast.
What're they doing? Malloy looks at the President grimly.
Getting ready to invade.
(beat) So where's Plissken?
Creaking. The WHOOSH of something swinging through the ai A huge blue eye opens. Looks around.
Plissken's boot is hooked in a twisted wire mesh...
And then Plissken swings like a pendulum, hanging from a strand of wire mesh attached somewhere above in the black Plissken's eye blinks.
Begins to reveal details: slimy walls. Below, a black pit Wind gushing. And then a light stabs across the void...
... The light hits Plissken's good eye... The light is from inside the eye of Pendejo Bob. He stand small ledge, at the mouth of a cave leading into the howl

Hey, Snake. You okay? (unhooks the lariat) I heard gunfire down here... (begins to swing the rope) Never been down this far before... (swings the rope in a huge arc) Grab this. Pendejo Bob tosses the lariat. The noose flies across the Plissken grabs it with his good hand.

Now hang on. Plissken wraps his good hand and arm in the noose, as Pen jerks the line hard. Plissken is in mid-swing, and the ro jerking pulls him abruptly in the opposite direction... Plissken's boot slips out of the wire mesh... And Plissken falls like a brick, stops abruptly as the li catches, and swings against the side of the pit. He dangl only his one good arm holding on to the rope. Pendejo Bob pulls the line upward, straining against Plis weight. Slowly Plissken rises, a tug at a time, hauled up of the pit toward the cave above... ... when suddenly he passes another opening, a storm drai Pendejo Bob. He swings into the drain, grasps the side wi hand, and pulls himself in... Pendejo Bob stares down at his rope disappearing into the the pit.

Hey, Snake...where are you? Plissken crawls into the slimy drain, pulls the rope off Ahead in the darkness is the rushing of water. He turns o legs, back toward the pit behind him. Bleeding. Numb in o His leg on fire.

(yells) I'm in another opening... Storm drain... There may be another way up to you... Plissken crawls along the drain. The sound of rushing wat louder. He comes to the edge of the drain. Right below him is ano drain filled with water rushing through it like a river. Plissken is stuck. He turns, in great pain, and starts ba the pit... when suddenly everything starts shaking. Boomi a small earthquake, a pre-shock.
Suddenly the concrete bottom on which he stands gives way disintegrates... And Plissken falls backward into the rushing water, and i suddenly downstream into the drain, disappearing from sig
Stands silently above, listening...
Snake... (no reply) Snake! Booming. The whole pit shudders, shaking. Another earthqu Pendejo Bob drops the rope, turns and dashes away down th vibrating storm drain...
Black oil-slicked water rushes in the moonlight, out of a opening in what appears to be a canyon wall.
As an arm shoots out, clutching the edges of the drain.

Emerges from the hole, slides out, tumbles down to a wate canyon bottom. He lies there for a moment, trying to focu eye. Stabbing pain in his shoulder and leg. Finally he ri unsteadily to his feet, looks around, trying to get his b He finds himself at the bottom of...

Straight down Wilshire Boulevard is an enormous canyon, a bottom gouged out of concrete in the big earthquake. At l feet deep, it is a vast trough leading past skyscrapers a buildings above, off into the distance. Plissken warily glances at his watch: 1 hour 10 minutes t Suddenly Plissken is struck by a pair of headlights. Pipe dune buggy comes bumping along the canyon bottom, sloshin water, pulling up next to Plissken.
Snake. Saw you at the game tonight. Great shot. (stares at him) You look like shit. Plissken hobbles over to the dune buggy as Pipeline gets
You feel those pre-shocks, Snake? Pipeline unties the various surfboards he has lashed to t of the buggy. He lifts one down and slings it under his a
Could be a big one comin' any minute now...
Where's... Cuervo Jones...?
Long gone. You'll never catch up with him now, Snake.
Where?

Anaheim. Headquarters for everything. The whole town's gonna be there. Things changin' fast around here, Snake. It's not the same as the old days, man. A thumping sound skyward. More choppers thunder over them their way southeast. Plissken grabs Pipeline with his goo
Take me there... But he's too weak. His hand slides off. Plissken sinks to knees. Pipeline stares at him.
You ain't doin' so good, Snake. You need help. (bends down, helps Plissken to his feet) You should talk to Hershe. She hates Cuervo. They used to be partners, but they split up.
Who?
Hershe. She lives downtown with Mojo Dellasandro in the big boat. Down that way. Pipeline points down the canyon to the east.
She's connected with the Black Cowboys, and they don't take shit from nobody... Suddenly that booming, shuddering rumble begins. The cany to shake. The water in the canyon floor sloshes wildly.

Yo', man. It's a big one. And the earthquake hits like a roaring sledgehammer. The the canyon crack. Plissken and Pipeline are thrown to the Skyscrapers above them on Wilshire rock and tremble in th Pieces of the building sheer off, fall. A parking garage Thunder shakes the earth around Plissken and Pipeline. Th floor splits open. Water pours into the cracks. Huge boul chunks of concrete tumble down the canyon walls. And then suddenly it all stops. The booming subsides. The earth stops shaking. Plissken a Pipeline get to their feet, look around. The water around continues to slosh about violently.
Tsunami, Snake. His eyes wide, a smile on his face, Pipeline hurries over dune buggy, grabs another surfboard from the back, hands Plissken.

Surf's up big time. Now there is another deep sound rising, coming from the w behind them: A bass roar that slowly climbs from the very of the register upward, as if some massive wall of doom w its way... Pipeline kneels, positions his surfboard in his hands.
Get ready, Snake. It's gonna be some kinda ride. Plissken looks behind him...

head_text.subj: THE FRONT EDGE OF THE TSUNAMI

text: Is blasting down the Wilshire Canyon, coming right for th a 25-foot wall of ocean water, moving fast, bellowing lik thunderclap. Plissken sees he can't climb out of the canyon in time, m to Pipeline, kneels down...
Let the front edge pick you up. Don't get on your board till it peaks. Behind them, the tsunami slams along the canyon, coming r them.

Don't lose it, man. You slip off your board and it's the Big Wipeout, you know what I mean? The roaring is so loud it's like being on the inside of a barrel. The tsunami is 100 feet away... 75 feet... 50 fee feet... It rolls up right behind them...
Hang on, Snake! (yells)

Of the tsunami sweeps under them. Pipeline and Plissken p from the canyon floor just as the water shovels them upwa cow catcher on a train. The water sweeps them up until th disappear under the blackness... Until suddenly Pipeline pops up on top of the tsunami, ri his surfboard, arms outstretched, feet braced. And then Plissken pops up beside him, surfing clumsily on the tsunami wave, kneeling on his surfboard. They blast down Wilshire Canyon at 80 miles an hour. Plis wobbly on the surfboard, but he manages to stay on top of wave. Finally, he gets the hang of it, glances over at Pi who grins from ear to ear.
Awesome, Snake. AWESOME, man! Plissken looks up ahead...

Five feet from street level. An old van speeds along what of Wilshire Boulevard, right on the canyon's edge. It vee debris in the street, changes lanes suddenly, hell bent f leather. Plissken and Pipeline move closer and closer to the van a tsunami sweeps them along. Now they move alongside the van and Plissken stares over.
Behind the wheel is Map To The Stars Eddie, driving like lunatic, his teeth bared and set, madder than shit. Plissken's eye widens, burns.

(to Pipeline) See you later. And suddenly Plissken shifts his weight, and the surfboar and slides sideways, across the surface of the tsunami al over to the edge, right next to the van. Map To The Stars glances to his left...
Is surfing the tsunami not 10 feet away from him. Map To The Stars Eddie stares in absolute horror. Plisske the board again, and slides another 5 feet closer...

head_text.subj: AS MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE

text: Jams the pedal, and the van screams forward...

Stands up and leaps from the surfboard... For a moment he is airborne, leaping across the gap to th and slams into the side of the van. He grabs on to the ro on with one hand, his body whipping against the rocking, side. Map To The Stars Eddie starts swerving, trying to t Plissken off.
The van shoots back and forth across Wilshire, Plissken d inches from the tsunami-filled canyon. Plissken pulls him and crawls onto the roof...

Map To The Stars Eddie pulls his gun, cocks it... When suddenly Plissken's hand snakes down from the roof, in the driver's window, grabs his hair, and slams his for into the steering wheel with a THOCK! Map To The Stars Eddie goes out like a light. He slumps o the seat... but his foot is stuck on the accelerator. Plissken grabs the wheel with his left hand, and manages the van from the roof. The van lurches wildly, hits a chu concrete in the street, skids, fishtailing violently from impact. It smashes against the curb, screeches and bumps concrete. Map To The Stars Eddie's foot is bumped right off the acc and the van slows to a wobbling, grinding stop. Plissken slowly climbs down from the roof, opens the driv door, shoves Map To The Stars Eddie out of the way, and j

Plissken pulls out into the street and speeds off down Wi Map To The Stars Eddie starts to come around. Plissken grabs his gun, cocks it, puts the barrel up agai To The Stars Eddie's temple just as he comes to.
Listen up. I need directions. Downtown. Somebody named Hershe.
Sure, Snake. No problem. (groggy) You gonna kill me?
Later.
I couldn't help it, Snake. I had to shoot you. Cuervo made me do it, I swear to God, man.
Cease fire with the bullshit.
Right. Keep goin' straight. Two blocks down, turn right.
Cuervo Jones' image fills the screen. He addresses the ca holds the prototype in his hands.
Abandon your firebases by 0500 hours. Have the news media standing by for my coronation. I'm arriving in style. PULL BACK from the TV screen to reveal we are in...
Malloy, the President, Brazen, and the other Controllers Police Personnel stare silently at their TV screens.
He must be bouncing the signal from one of our communications satellites.
That means CableNet has already picked it up. This thing's going live all over the country.
(on the TV) It's a brand new day comin' up this morning, and I'm just so proud to be leading the parade. See you soon, putos. SSSZZZ. The image blinks off into static. A grim silence.
The prototype appears to be armed, Mr. President. (the President nods grimly) Shall I begin evacuation?
Does he know how to activate it?
Well, yeah. All you have to do is push the button.
What about Plissken? He could still be -
Forget him. He's dead.
That may not be true, Mr. President. (beat) He's one tough case. Plissken's been dead so many times I can't count. But he never stays down. A long beat.
There are two choices, Mr. President. Wait for Plissken, or surrender. It's your decision. The President sighs heavily.
Jammed next to the remains of the Bonaventure Hotel is th Mary, permanently dry-docked between the broken skyscrape Big One. The van stops next to a huge hole in the side of the ship
The glow of Map To The Stars Eddie's flashlight takes him Plissken deeper and deeper into the hulking remains of th
They walk through a dimly lighted area lined with shops. glass display windows are covered with layers of impenetr dirt.
They enter a long, narrow corridor. At the end is a doorw is light in the room beyond.

Plissken and Map To The Stars Eddie enter a long room lit jets on the walls. In it is a crumbling, Victorian swimmi A heavy mist rises from the pool's surface and hangs over everything. At the far end is a group of people. Spinal and the Black Gang. Boots, spurs, dusters, and guns. Mojo Dellasandro. Jamaican Voodoo witch doctor. A brutal, face. And a beautiful woman in a bathing suit, her back f Plissken and Map To The Stars Eddie approach.
Hey, Hershe. How're you doin'? The woman turns and faces them. This is HERSHE, an absolu drop-dead, gorgeous transvestite who looks completely con as a woman but talks in Isaac Hayes' voice.
(eyes brightening) Hershe - it's Snake Plissken.
Yeah, Hershe. I brought him to see you. Plissken walks right up to Hershe, has no reaction at all transvestite.
I need a favor.
What's in it for me? Plissken stares, a glimmer of recognition on his face.
Wait a minute. I know that voice. (beat) You're Carjack Malone.
Not anymore.
You two know each other? Plissken is seething. Hershe remains calm, glacial.
You owe me. You left me holdin' everything back there in Cleveland.
(astounded) Hershe, you were in Cleveland?
Yeah. With me and Texas Mike O'Shay.
I was called away on urgent business, Snake.
Don't lie to me.
All right, so I made another deal.
I got a new deal for you. Plissken raises Map To The Stars Eddie's gun, aims it rig between Hershe's eyes.
You help me, you live. The others tense, hands on guns.
I wouldn't be doin' that, Snake.
We have a little arrangement. Anything happens to me, you're dead.
I'm already dead.
(long beat) I see your point. What's the favor?
(looks at his watch) Get me to Cuervo Jones. Get me to the Kingdom. I got one hour.
Dream on, blue eye.
Say goodnight, Carjack. Plissken cocks his gun, starts to squeeze the trigger...
Wait a minute. All right. Hold on.
Cuervo Jones has more firepower than two armies. No one gets near him.
And he's got the prototype. And the girl. He holds all the cards.
Exactly what is this prototype? What does it do?

You push the button, it sends a signal to a ring of space defense satellites. They're orbiting bombs. Nukes. They explode. Huge space burst. (beat) EMP. Electromagnetic Pulse. It happens instantly when a nuke is airburst. EMP shuts down every power source below the satellites - instantly. All electrical devices, computers, cars, airplanes, cities. It's the dark ages again.
So whoever has it runs the show.
They were gonna use it on South America, Africa, Asia - any country hostile to the United States.
Only Cuervo's got it now.
And that ring of satellites will be in position over the U.S. at 5:00 a.m. this morning.
How do you know all this?
I used to represent the guy who invented it. I swear to God, Snake. No bullshit. A long silence.
So what's the deal, gorgeous?
We get the girl and the prototype. And we get out.
All of us?
Yeah.
Me too?
(stares at him hard) We'll see.
Why should we leave? I love L.A. Where we gonna go? What's the payoff?
I'd like to get out but I don't have enough money.
The President's promised to give whoever helps me 1 million dollars.
Yeah? Greenbacks? I got ten million of them.
Uh-uh. Bluebacks. This gets everyone's attention.
Aw, come on, Snake.
Bluebacks. I'm not bullshittin'. I swear to God.
I don't know, sounds thin to me.
You want to stay here, while Cuervo Jones rules the world?
(grim) No, that sucks. (beat) How are we getting out?
I don't know yet.
Shit.
You always were a loser, Plissken. Makin' things up as you go along. That's why I cut out on you in Cleveland. You're just a bum like the rest of us. Smoke has begun to drift into the pool area.
(a soft voice) Use the air. They look at him.
They're burning. Santa Anas. The night wind.
What're you talking about, Mojo?
Death from above...

Plissken, Hershe, Map To The Stars Eddie, Spinal and the Cowboy Gang stand on the top deck of the Queen Mary. Mojo Dellasandro straps each man into his own hang glider rig. whips around them. The hillsides in the distance are on f They look like strange oversized moths lined up on the ed deck. The wind picks up Map To The Stars Eddie's rig. He and down, side to side, buffeted wildly until Mojo Dellas brings him back down to the decking.
I don't know about this thing.
Don't like it, don't come.
Where'd you get these rigs, Carjack?

My name is Hershe Hernandez, do you understand, cowboy? As Mojo Dellasandro passes out various weapons to the men The Stars Eddie leans over to Plissken, their hang glider thumping clumsily into each other. Eddie holds up that sm metal-plated portable radio he was carrying when we first
I got an idea, Snake. (shows Plissken the radio) This looks like the prototype, right?
Yeah, kinda.
So maybe we can pull off a Texas switch on Cuervo.
If he lets you get close enough.
The wind's up. Let's go. The men brace themselves. Map To The Stars Eddie looks li wants to die. Hershe looks over at Plissken and grins.
See you in hell, Snake.
If I'm late, Carjack, don't start without me. With that Plissken launches himself off the deck, sailing open space, then down toward the street...

Gliding through the air, as the wind picks him upward. He away from the street level, up toward the remains of the skyscrapers. Behind him, one after another, the group tak into the wind, diving, rising with the wind. Map To The Stars Eddie makes a rapid suicidal dive right toward the pavement below. He screams like a madman until lifts him at the last possible second.

The group of hang gliders sweep past the buildings. A bra family is having dinner by candlelight two feet from the sheer precipice, as the side of the skyscraper they live been torn off. They wave to Plissken as he passes. Two floors down, someone has hooked up huge speakers and croaking male voice is singing a Barbra Streisand hit to background track. A beautiful girl in a sheer diaphanous gown dances far ou narrow girder, waving a scarf at the moon. Plissken and the others now fly in formation, like avengi through the night, except for Map To The Stars Eddie who rising and plunging violently, barely in control.

An army of vehicles and people pour into Disneyland - but Disneyland gone to hell. A huge sign reads: "THE HAPPY KI The gates no longer exist. The overhead tram lies broken ground. Slowly vehicles drive straight inside... A battered old limousine carries Cuervo Jones and a grim- Utopia past the ruins of the train and around the ghost-t square of Main Street. Ahead is the fairy castle, broken crumbling, like some relic from a nightmare. Around it ar thrill rides, tossed in to a jumbled mass by the force of original earthquake. Crowds are waiting. Gangs of every conceivable descriptio gangs. Female gangs. Gangs of children. Also families wit hangers-on. As soon as the limousine appears, the crowds cheering.
Cuervo Jones stares out at the masses.

They're simple people. They love a party. (turns to Utopia) We're gonna throw them one hell of a party when we get to America. Right? Utopia is silent, sullen. Cuervo raises his hand to her a jumps, cowering.
Put a smile on your face. A terrified smile spreads across Utopia's face.

As the limousine inches down Main Street, suddenly a wall headlights pop on. 100 or so battered old vintage Chevys engines, begin bouncing up and down wildly on hydraulic l Gangs begin cheering, firing their weapons into the air l Year's Eve. At the end of Main Street is a huge open area - almost an beyond which are parked a literal army of helicopters. As the limousine stops, and Cuervo Jones emerges, Utopia arm, the cheering begins, a wall of sound through the par Black Muslims step out to greet Cuervo, dressed in turban headgear and sunglasses, wearing black capes and carrying Thompson machine guns. They stop, give the right-handed p salute. One of them, BIVOUAC, speaks to Cuervo.
Cuervo Jones. Welcome, my Brother. Cuervo Jones turns to the crowd, extends his arms.
Are you ready for the New World? And the loudest, longest cheer you've ever heard goes up.
Plissken and the group sail through the sky like silent a angels toward Disneyland below them and several miles awa
Glances at his wrist watch. Only 20 minutes left. Map To Eddie swings wildly over in his direction, manages to sta his glider for a few moments.
Is that what I think it is?
Yeah. The place kept changing owners. Finally went bankrupt. That thing in Paris killed 'em. Hershe and Spinal sweep over next to Plissken and fly in formation.
Snake. We need some kind of diversion. A beat later all of them look over at Map To The Stars Ed

Cuervo Jones leads Utopia toward a large attack helicopte front of all the others. The choppers are all starting up roaring, blades turning. Suddenly shooting down out of the sky is a screaming, yel To The Stars Eddie diving out of control, eyes wide as he Cuervo Jones and Utopia.
Cuervo. Hey, man, I made it! I made it! Wait for me...
Map To The Stars Eddie crash lands into the ruins of a fa restaurant - KACRUNCH! A beat or so later he staggers out of the rig, dizzy and
Hey Cuervo... Cuervo Jones turns to Bivouac.
Would you please kill him for me?
My pleasure. Bivouac raises his machine gun...
Cuervo, wait! I got news. There's about to be an attack. Cuervo holds up his hand, stopping Bivouac. Everyone tens To The Stars Eddie races over...
You're about to get hit, Cuervo. It's Plissken.
You told me he was dead.
I thought he was, but he came back.
Where? Map To The Stars Eddie moves close to Cuervo, out of brea looking like he may faint...
Oh Cuervo...
(long beat) What?
(stalling) It's so good to see you again.
Where's Plissken?
He's... near.
You're stalling, Eddie. (grabs him) Talk, you little gringo!

(eyes wide) Cuervo, look out behind you! Map To The Stars Eddie suddenly grabs Cuervo as if to pro and manages to wrap himself around the prototype in Cuerv At the same moment Bivouac and the Black Muslim open fire old storefront behind Cuervo Jones. The place is shredded Cuervo Jones pulls Map To The Stars Eddie up off the grou grabs what looks like the prototype out of his clutches.

You've lied to me for the very last time. Cuervo Jones pulls out a pistol, cocks it, aims at Map To Stars Eddie's face... KABLOOM! No, not the pistol. A huge explosion rocks Main WHOOSH! Suddenly out of the night sky Spinal and the Blac dive right down across Main Street. KABLAM! Another explosion sends everyone scurrying for co Spinal pulls the pin on a grenade, throws it... BLAMM! BLOOM! Explosions erupt everywhere! Cuervo Jones grabs Utopia, turns to run toward to the lea helicopter when... Plissken roars down out of the sky and his him full force Plissken and the hang glider go tumbling and crashing in

Chaos and pandemonium. Hershe dives down over the gangs, hellfire from his automatic rifle. People running. Explosions. Map To The Stars Eddie grabs Utopia. Plissken and Cuervo Jones get to their feet and have at i Through flames and running people Plissken and Cuervo bat In Cuervo's hand is a long black knife. Just as he's plun Plissken steps aside and grabs him. Locked together, they savagely. The knife cuts Plissken's chest. Cuervo moves for Plissken's throat. Plissken smashes him in the face. They both grip the knife in a deadlock. From above, Spinal dives down and hurls a grenade. Cuervo Plissken disappear in a huge flash of fire and smoke as t grenade erupts out of the pavement nearby. When the smoke clears, three things are on the ground. Pl Cuervo Jones. The prototype. Instantly Plissken and Cuervo dive for the prototype. Pli it, kicks Cuervo in the face, drags himself to his feet a off running (as fast as a man can run with one bullet in Map To The Stars Eddie drags Utopia toward the lead helic Hershe comes in for a landing. Spinal comes in for a landing, continues to throw grenade other Black Cowboys land, provide covering fire. Plissken races for the chopper. Behind him, Cuervo Jones feet and in pursuit. Hershe opens fire at Cuervo. Cuervo dives behind a smokin burning Chevy.

As everyone scrambles in. A Black Cowboy is hit by gunfir down the bulkhead and out the door. Plissken jumps in the left seat, takes the controls. Utop Map To The Stars Eddie both climb in the right seat toget others are in the back, firing back at the gangs. Plisske in power.
The needle's at 100% plus. Full power.
The lead chopper shudders, trying to get off the ground. continues.
The ship shakes violently.
She's overloaded! We're too heavy.
(screams from the rear compartment) Somebody get off!
(glares at him) Who? All eyes quickly move to Map To The Stars Eddie...
Bullets rip through the windscreen.
Is moving, through the smoke, charging the ship!
The ship trembles. Plissken moves his feet, jams in the l rotor pedal all the way.
Rotates, turns around 180 degrees on the ground, pushed b tail rotor force.
As Plissken inches it forward...

Begins sliding across the ground, skids grinding along th pavement, sparks flying - slowly at first, now picking up In the cockpit, the ship lurches and jumps and slams! Eve bounced around. The helicopter moves fast now - faster -
As they rise up, an inch off the ground - then two inches foot - Cuervo Jones emerges from the smoke, running ahead of the gangs, barreling toward the ever-so-slowly rising chopper
As it lifts - five feet - climbing... The helicopter pulls away from the charging gangs and Cue sprinting figure.
See the Matterhorn ahead, coming closer and closer. Hersh out the door.

We're not gonna make it over the fuckin' mountain! The helicopter moves right toward the edge of the Matterh feet... 10... Plissken tries to maneuver out of the way.. feet... 5... The helicopter wobbles over the top of the mountain, the skid catching on the Matterhorn's edge! A horrible cracki and the right skid is ripped off from its front mounting, half off the ship! On the ground, Cuervo Jones jumps into one of the waiting helicopters as now the gangs race into ships and begin li into the sky. Finally Cuervo's chopper lifts off...
An alarm horn sounds. Everyone is on the move.
A crowd surrounds a computer screen with a small green bl over a grid of L.A.
Aircraft leaving the island, sir. It's passed into restricted space, heading this way. Malloy, the President, and Brazen exchange glances.
Is it Plissken? Nobody knows.
Commander, I'm getting radio contact with the aircraft.
Boost it. The COM Officer flips a switch, and we hear Plissken's vo booming through HQ.
Get ready, shitheads. We're comin' in.
Thank God.
(grabs a radio mike) Plissken - this is Malloy. Do you have the prototype?
(into his radio) Yeah, I got it. Plissken glances at the transistor radio in his hand, sho his boot, reaches his hand out to Map To The Stars Eddie.
(to Map To The Stars Eddie) Now give me the real one. Utopia stares into Plissken's eye. Map To The Stars Eddie shrugs innocently
I couldn't make the switch, Snake. I don't have it. Suddenly Utopia reaches into Map To The Stars Eddie's coa pulls out the real prototype. She hands it to Plissken
Now we're even, Snake. Map To The Stars Eddie makes a lunge for it, but Plissken him in the face. His head bobs slowly back and forth for then he slumps in the seat.
Malloy set up in the staging area for landing.
Commander Malloy - he's got lots of company. Malloy and the others look at the computer screen. Plissk green blip is followed by hundreds of other green blips a rapidly closing in on him...
Battle stations... The room springs into action...
I think we've burned off enough fuel. We may be lighter enough to hover. Just barely.
Can you land?

No. The right skid's broken. If I try to set it down she'll crash. I have to stay in a hoverwhile you jump off. (beat as Plissken looks at Utopia) Hey, Carjack. We gotta hide the girl. Give her your dress.
(ice cold) My name is no longer Carjack. Will you please get that through your fucking head?
Holy shit. They look, as suddenly the night sky on either side of th filled with gang helicopters!

location: SKY OVER THE SAN FERNANDO SEA

text: The lead helicopter is surrounded by enemy choppers. Abov on either side. Right next to Plissken, Cuervo's chopper pulls up just te away. Cuervo grins out at Plissken evilly, unhooks himsel his seat... On the other side, another chopper with Bivouac and the B Muslims pull up. In the rear compartment, a Black Muslim looks like a huge harpoon gun mounted to the floor.
The line shoots out and a gleaming grappling hook slams i side of Plissken's chopper, the prongs clawing in, holdin lead helicopter, the Black Cowboys, Spinal and Hershe aim weapons.

Don't shoot! They can drag us down into the sea. Cuervo Jones leaps from the opened door of his chopper, f through space, lands on Plissken's door with a WHUMP! He through the side window and grabs Plissken. KABLAM! KABLAM! Gang choppers open fire, riddling the rea compartment with bullets. Spinal and several Black Cowboy hit! Plissken fights Cuervo through the door.
(to Utopia) Take the controls! Utopia stares at him.

What do I do? But Cuervo wrenches the door open, grabs Plissken, and pu out of the seat. Utopia grabs the controls. The lead helicopter goes wild, lurching and swinging and Plissken and Cuervo are locked in a death grip, hanging o doorway, one foot in, one foot out. Plissken embraces Cuervo and throws them both over the ed They fall through space, locked together, until... WHAP! They are jolted to a dead stop, swinging in mid-air Plissken's arm wrapped around the dangling right skid. The lead helicopter bucks and spins and swings, Plissken Cuervo suspended below, struggling to the death, whipped forth by the helicopter's gyrations. In the cockpit, Utopia grabs the controls. The ship is sh swinging like a pendulum. Hershe is hit with gunfire, flo rear compartment. Map To The Stars Eddie slowly regains consciousness, stares in horror at Utopia.

Where's Plissken? Outside, Cuervo clutches Plissken around the neck, strugg thrashing. Plissken head butts him, dazing him for a seco KA-CRACK! The dangling skid is breaking loose from its mo the helicopter above. Plissken and Cuervo Jones stare up, each other, then both begin pulling themselves up the ski climbing hand over hand, in a desperate race... Both men reach the bottom of the helicopter and leap acro left skid as the dangling right skid breaks off and falls San Fernando Sea. Plissken and Cuervo kick at each other. slides away from him, looks up... sees the grappling hook into the side of the helicopter... Plissken swings up, straddling the skid. He reaches up an prying loose the grappling hook. Cuervo's coming right up him, reaching for him, a huge knife in his hands. He rais knife - when Map To The Stars Eddie leans out of the cock lowers a gun and aims it right at Cuervo.
Hey, Cuervo. Cuervo looks at him, starts to say something, eyes bulgin

If you get to America - let's do lunch. KABLAM! KABLAM! The shots hit, and Cuervo buckles, falls off the skid, plunging downward toward the surface of the Fernando Sea... KASPLASH! Plissken rips out the grappling hook...
Map To The Stars Eddie is hit with gunfire, dies, falls o seat, out of the door, out of the helicopter - plunges to water below. Plissken jumps back inside the cockpit.
Snake, look.

Police battle helicopters thunder toward them. In unison, police helicopters launch their missiles from gun platfor Burning, white-sulfurous napalm shells streak across the and hit enemy choppers. The sky around the lead helicopte filled with explosions, waves of rolling fire, falling fl wrecks plunging past, as enemy choppers begin to hit the It is a dreamlike, slow-motion ballet. Huge black police circle lazily around the enemy choppers, their flex-guns rockets spitting blue-white fire. The pound the living he the enemy choppers. In f.g. Plissken's helicopter sweeps wall.
Malloy, the President, Brazen and the rest the Firebase w Plissken's helicopter approaches, then zooms right over R and heads for the distant treeline.
Where the hell is he going?
Plissken's helicopter comes in, lower and lower, into a h feet above the ground. Inside, Plissken pulls in all the he's got.
It's taking all the power we've got to hover.
Shows 100% plus power. The helicopter is in a trembling h Inside...
Jump out. Head for the treeline and disappear. Utopia stares at him.
Go! Utopia jumps out of the helicopter... lands on the ground takes off running into the darkness. Inside...

All right, baby. Don't be too rough on me. We're gonna land. Plissken slowly drops the collective control. The left sk down, and the ship continues to descend, tips, begins to Inside, as the chopper rolls over, Plissken braces himsel blades hit the ground, the chopper goes wild. The fuselag and twists in a grinding fury. Smoke and debris fly. The snap off...

Looking out the front, the blades smash through the winds barely missing the top of Plissken's head. Plissken is sp with glass, a piece of metal debris protrudes from the fl of his biceps. Blood pours. The rear compartment explodes flames as the engine grinds into the gas tank. Fire billo the cockpit, engulfing Plissken... Outside, Plissken pulls himself out of the door. He is on Dives away from the copper and rolls across the ground ju flaming mid-section of the ship explodes in a roaring fir Plissken climbs to his feet, smoking, wounded... ... as Malloy, the President, Brazen, and a squad of poli in vehicles. They slowly get out... ... as Plissken limps toward them...
Where's the anti-toxin...?
Give me the prototype. Plissken reaches into his boot, hands it to the President

Hold it, Plissken. Now give us the real one. Plissken reaches down into his other boot, comes out with The Stars Eddie's transistor radio. The President hurls t prototype away, walks to Plissken and grabs the phony. Pl glances at it lying on the ground. Nobody moves. Plissken looks at their faces.
Give me the goddamn shot! Suddenly everyone begins to smirk. A couple cops laugh.
It was all a fake, Plissken. Plissken stares at him. More laughter.
You were injected with glucose. There is no Plutoxin 7 virus. You were never going to die - at least not from anything we gave you.
C'mon, Snake - it's L.A. Everything's phony, you know that. Plissken moves toward the President, stops inches away.
Relax, war hero. We took you for a ride, and you came through. Not bad for a dirtbag like you.
You're free, Plissken. But if you even so much as break wind on a country road I'll crush you like a bug. The President glares at Plissken, turns, walks away.
Commander... (Malloy looks at him) Look what we found. Across the clearing come two policemen dragging Utopia al them. They bring her up in front of Malloy. Utopia glance Plissken.
You didn't finish the mission, Plissken. We'll have to do that for you. Plissken, Malloy and Brazen watch as Utopia is taken away Plissken turns to Malloy.
Got a smoke?

You're gonna have to learn to respect the law, Snake. The United States is a no- smoking nation. No smoking, no drinking, do drugs, no women unless you're married, no guns, no foul language. It's a brand new day for you, Snake.
The name's Plissken. Plissken walks away. Follow his feet as they stop next to prototype lying in the grass...
Utopia is being strapped into an electric chair by her po guards. The guards step back from Utopia. One of them wal to a huge switch on the wall.
He holds the real prototype, calmly pushes the button.
The ring of space satellites hover silently above the Ear the United States, North America below, as a beautiful su beginning. Suddenly the satellites explode into white...
As the sky is lit white. Malloy, Brazen, and the cops loo vehicles stop. Lights out. Sounds of motors running down.
Darkness. No power. Everyone looks around. Utopia smiles.
The daylight is coming as police helicopters fall from th crashing. Panic. Policemen run everywhere. A duty sergean up to Malloy...
We're being attacked, Commander. The north wall.
All of L.A. has arrive at the wall in boats. Gangs lean l use ropes and hooks - they scale the wall. Pendejo Bob le charge. Pipeline is right behind him.
Gunfire. A pitched battle as cops try to repel the horde invaders as they pour over the wall.
The Firebase is overrun by invaders. Hand-to-hand combat. War III has begun. Panicked cops race for the trees, aban their positions.
The Third World warriors free Utopia from the electric ch joins them as they swarm through the halls...

Plissken is at the edge of the Firebase, moving out into hillside. Camera tracks with him towards the rising sun. A smile crosses Plissken's face. He tosses the prototype ravine, and walks away into the sunrise.
